resources.string: The first step for building a PC is knowing the basics of every PC hardware part that is needed. Please click the step 1 button for more!
The second step for building a PC is knowing where all of the parts go to make sure that it runs when you turn it on. Please click the step 2 button for more!
The final step for building a PC is starting up the system and learning set up the bios. Please click the step 3 button for more!
